# 7.0 Docs

## Interop

- [RuntimeInformation.OSArchitecture under emulation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/interop/7.0/osarchitecture-emulation.md): Learn about the breaking change in interop in .NET 7 where RuntimeInformation.OSArchitecture now returns the correct value under emulation.
